share on x dw dianna dobbins wertz. jun 13 at 8:09 pm aunt darlene our family will miss your kind and loving heart and your warm and friendly smile you will be remembered always with love dianna dobbins wertz and the wilfred dobbins family. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... visitation jun 16. 4:00 pm - 6:00 pm addy funeral home406 west state street. newcomerstown, oh, us, 43832. get order flowers now for darlene's visitation funeral service. jun 16. 6:00 pm - 6:30 pm addy funeral home406 west state street. newcomerstown, oh, us, 43832. get order flowers now for darlene's funeral service no medias to show. addy funeral home website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store 
get order flowers now for darlene's visitation funeral service. jun 16. 6:00 pm - 6:30 pm addy funeral home406 west state street. newcomerstown, oh, us, 43832. get order flowers now for darlene's funeral service show less view & service share facebook twitter google+ post now light a candle virtual gifts yellow rose periwinkle blue green red dove angel heart hug butterfly roses hands in prayer bible sunshine teddy american flag veteran rosary gardener interlocked rings catholic cross football baseball golf sailboat firefighter non catholic cross basketball police buddha hockey coach soccer star of david canadian flag menorah memories events media share a memory of darlene (glazer) white send comfort to the white family when it's needed most. to show you care same-day hand delivery by a local florist! li linda ingram. jun 14 at 8:00 pm such a sweet lady with a heart of gold and a smile that could cheer anyone up. you will be missed but never forgotten. i know you were looking forward to our family gathering, but your have a beautiful family reunion with all our loved ones in heaven. i pray comfort for all the family in knowing your are resting in the arms of god. love you always, linda and roger ingram. comment share comment share facebook twitter 
darlene (glazer) white| home obituaries flowers & gifts grief & healing plan ahead resources about contact addy funeral home
